backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no methods or logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing a deployment retry and listing related files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing summaries of multiple frontend files and their purposes.
frontend/BUILD_DEPLOY_RETRY_NOTES.md: Notes documenting a retry build/deploy attempt, asset verification, commands, and expected outcomes.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styling with OKLCH color tokens and theme variables for light and dark modes.
frontend/index.html: Basic HTML entry file mounting the React app and loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root component toggling between the landing and gratitude pages based on user interaction.
Component for an evasive No button that relocates randomly within its container on user interaction.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook creating and managing a backend actor instance tied to Internet Identity authentication.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and hooks for Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient with login, clear, and status handling.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS with Valentine-themed OKLCH colors, gradients, and custom animations for hearts and pulsing effects.
frontend/src/main.tsx: React entrypoint initializing QueryClient, InternetIdentityProvider, and rendering App.
frontend/src/pages/GratitudePage.tsx: Gratitude page displaying themed images, floating heart decorations, and a romantic message.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: React landing page showing themed images, animated hearts, a Yes button triggering navigation, and an evasive No button.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS config extending typography, colors, shadows, animations, and plugins for the Valentine-themed UI.
project_state.json: Project state file describing requirements, features, issues, and build context for the Valentineâ€™s website.
